articles.title: Meet ‘The Kerala Story’ actress Adah Sharma - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: In ‘The Kerala Story’, Adah plays the role of Shalini Unnikrishnan a Hindu woman in Kerala who is forced to convert to Islam and join terrorist outfit ISIS after her marriage to a Muslim man.
articles.content: She has since appeared in numerous Telugu, Tamil, and Hindi films, including 'S/O Satyamurthy', 'Kshanam', 'Commando 2', and 'Bypass Road'.

articles.description: Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, Ananya Panday, Aditya Roy Kapur, Malaika Arora, Arjun Kapoor were among the guests at Karan Johar's house party last night.
articles.content: Karan Johar hosted an intimate bash at his house last night. Seen at the party were celebrities such as Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor, Ananya Panday, Aditya Roy Kapur and Malaika Arora.
